Params[3]: School Archive — 17513-2/10
...Finally, everyone has left.
Your vital signs indicate that you are exhausted. Would you like a warm glass of red wine?
That won't be necessary... Any news from the city?
There were three new explosions in the city. Totalitarians and liberals engaged in more fighting during the council...
...Vital signs indicate that your blood pressure is rising.
Why has it become like this...
How could human aspirations be so easily distorted by greed and animalistic behavior?
Or... did I overestimate humanity's virtues?
Due to your physical condition, I have laid out blood pressure medicine and an automatic syringe here just in case.
Although it is against your will, I have also placed a warm glass of red wine with sleeping pills in it by the table.
Machines... are absent of animalistic instincts and the desire to fight. It only ever has its eyes set on results...
If only there was some way to combine human consciousness with machine behavior...
Is something wrong? You are talking to yourself.
...It's nothing. Bring me my terminal.
Understood.
School Archive — 17514-1/10
You know the two factions can't keep fighting forever...
...Is there really no other way to resolve this peacefully?
That is why, after negotiation, both factions have unanimously decided to give you the key to the cryogenic chamber.
Once we've all entered the cryogenic chamber, only you will be able to initiate the protocol.
...Will they respect whatever result the mechanoids reach? Or have they been working on something in secret like before?
...There's no way of knowing.
